Name: LU 614 - Zoning, 2513-2523 Avenue O Rezoning, Brooklyn (20190438 ZMK)
Title: Resolution approving with modifications the decision of the City Planning Commission on ULURP No. C 190438 ZMK, a Zoning Map amendment (Preconsidered L.U. No. 614).

History.Action: Approved by Committee with Modifications and Referred to CPC
History.Description: This Resolution was Approved by Committee with Modifications and Referred to CPC
A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved, by Council approved by consent Roll Call.

Minutes of the Stated Meeting - February 27, 2020

{\rtf1\fbidis\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\deflang1033\deflangfe1033{\fonttbl{\f0\froman\fprq2\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}{\f1\fmodern\fprq1\fcharset0 Courier;}}

\viewkind4\uc1
\v0\par
\b By Council Members Salamanca and Moya\b0\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, Pulmonary and Sleep Medical, P.C., \expndtw-6 filed an application \expndtw0 pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for an amendment of the Zoning Map, Section No. 23b, changing from an R2 District to an R3-2 District, Borough of Brooklyn, Community District 14 (ULURP No. C 190438 ZMK) (the "Application");\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, the City Planning Commission filed with the Council on January 24, 2020, its decision dated January 22, 2020 (the "Decision") on the Application;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tx1440\tx2160\tqr\tx9360\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, the Decision is subject to review and action by the Council pursuant to Section 197-d of the City Charter;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, upon due notice, the Council held a public hearing on the Decision and Application on January 30, 2020;\par
\par
WHEREAS, the Council has considered the land use and other policy issues relating to the Decision and Application; and\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tab WHEREAS, the Council has considered the relevant environmental issues, including the negative declaration issued August 23\super rd\nosupersub , 2019 (CEQR No. 19DCP015K) which include an (E) designation related to air quality and noise that has been assigned to the project area in connection with the proposed action (the \ldblquote E\rdblquote  Designation (E-541)).\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj  \par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx0\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928 RESOLVED:\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tab The Council finds that the action described herein will have no significant impact on the environment as set forth in the (E) Designation (E-541) and Negative Declaration.\par
\pard\ltrpar\b\f1\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\b0\f0 Pursuant to Sections 197-d and 200 of the City Charter and on the basis of the Decision and Application, the environmental determination and consideration described in the report, C 190438 ZMK, incorporated by reference herein, and the record before the Council, the Council approves the Decision of the City Planning Commission with the following modifications:\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar Matter \ul underlined\ulnone  is new, to be added;\par
Matter \strike struck out\strike0  is to be deleted;\par
Matter double struck out is old, deleted by the City Council;\par
\pard\ltrpar\sa240 Matter \uldb double-underlined\ulnone  is new, added by the City Council\cf1\f1\line\f0 Matter within # # is defined in Section 12-10;\line * * * indicates where unchanged text appears in the Zoning Resolution\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\cf0\par
\pard\ltrpar\par
\pard\ltrpar\qj The Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, effective as of December 15, 1961, and as subsequently amended, is further amended by changing the Zoning Map, Section No. 18a, by changing an R2 district to a R3-2 \uldb R3-1\ulnone  district bounded by a line 100 feet northerly of Avenue O, East 26th Street, Avenue O, and a line midway between East 26th  Street and Bedford Avenue, as shown on a diagram (for illustrative purposes only) dated August 26, 2019 and subject to the conditions of CEQR Declaration E-541, Borough of Brooklyn, Community District 14.\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj Adopted.\par
\par
\tab Office of the City Clerk, \}\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj The City of New York,  \} ss.:\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi1440\qj I hereby certify that the foregoing is a true copy of a Resolution passed by The Council of The City of New York on February 27, 2020, on file in this office.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\par
\par
\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qr .....................................................\par
City Clerk, Clerk of The Council \par
